an8.62:1.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano alaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.62:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:1.7: kalyāṇavāco ca hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo, poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.62:1.8: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.62:1.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano alaṃ paresaṃ. (1)
an8.62:2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano alaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.62:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:2.8: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.62:2.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano alaṃ paresaṃ. (2)
an8.62:3.1: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano nālaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.62:3.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:3.7: no ca kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo, poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.62:3.8: no ca sandassako hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.62:3.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano nālaṃ paresaṃ. (3)
an8.62:4.1: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ nālaṃ attano.
an8.62:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:4.5: no ca dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.62:4.6: na ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an8.62:4.7: kalyāṇavāco ca hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo …pe… atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.62:4.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano. (4)
an8.62:5.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano nālaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.62:5.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:5.7: no ca kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo, poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.62:5.8: no ca sandassako hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.62:5.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, nālaṃ paresaṃ. (5)
an8.62:6.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano.
an8.62:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:6.5: no ca dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.62:6.6: no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an8.62:6.8: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.62:6.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano. (6)
an8.62:7.1: Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, nālaṃ paresaṃ.
an8.62:7.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:7.4: no ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇajātiko hoti;
an8.62:7.7: no ca kalyāṇavāco hoti …pe… atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.62:7.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ attano, nālaṃ paresaṃ. (7)
an8.62:8.1: Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano.
an8.62:8.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:8.4: no ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇajātiko hoti;
an8.62:8.5: no ca dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhitā hoti;
an8.62:8.6: no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an8.62:8.7: kalyāṇavāco ca hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo, poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an8.62:8.8: sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an8.62:8.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ paresaṃ, nālaṃ attano”ti. (8)
